Type.Name: TriggerActionFunction

TypeSignature.Value: public sealed delegate void TriggerActionFunction (string msg, string level, string [] supinfo);

Type.ThreadSafetyStatement: Gtk# is thread aware, but not thread safe; See the Gtk# Thread Programming for details.

Docs.summary: Can be used as a target for of instances.

remarks.para: msg : The human-readable message that was passed to . May be null.
level : The severity level of the event. May be null.
supinfo : The section in which the event belongs.
